casebody.data:
Jamie REEP et al.
v.
BECK. No. 345PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 16, 2005. Elizabeth F. Parsons, Assistant Attorney General, James Peeler Smith, Special Counsel, for Beck. James W. Carter, for Reep.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of February 2005 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (Reep) shall have up to and including the 25th day of March 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 16th day of February 2005."
